mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_function_outbound ( id, function_id , function_module , checking_mode , is_foc_count_nums , scan_pattern , is_tip_inv_attr , is_scan_inv_attr , is_checking_to_outboundbox , is_auto_generate_outboundbox , is_scan_outboundbox , checking_print , is_scan_sku_photograph , scan_inv_attr_photograph , weighing_print , is_validate_weight , weight_float_percentage , way_bill_print_type , is_scan_way_bill , handover_print , is_tip_handover_station , ou_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{functionId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{functionModule,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{checkingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isFocCountNums,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{scanPattern,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{isTipInvAttr,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{isScanInvAttr,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{isCheckingToOutboundbox,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{isAutoGenerateOutboundbox,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{isScanOutboundbox,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{checkingPrint,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isScanSkuPhotograph,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{scanInvAttrPhotograph,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{weighingPrint,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isValidateWeight,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{weightFloatPercentage,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{wayBillPrintType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isScanWayBill,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{handoverPrint,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isTipHandoverStation,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_function_outbound SET function_id = #{functionId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , function_module = #{functionModule,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , checking_mode = #{checkingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_foc_count_nums = #{isFocCountNums,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , scan_pattern = #{scanPattern,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , is_tip_inv_attr = #{isTipInvAttr,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , is_scan_inv_attr = #{isScanInvAttr,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , is_checking_to_outboundbox = #{isCheckingToOutboundbox,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , is_auto_generate_outboundbox = #{isAutoGenerateOutboundbox,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , is_scan_outboundbox = #{isScanOutboundbox,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , checking_print = #{checkingPrint,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_scan_sku_photograph = #{isScanSkuPhotograph,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , scan_inv_attr_photograph = #{scanInvAttrPhotograph,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , weighing_print = #{weighingPrint,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_validate_weight = #{isValidateWeight,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , weight_float_percentage = #{weightFloatPercentage,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , way_bill_print_type = #{wayBillPrintType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_scan_way_bill = #{isScanWayBill,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , handover_print = #{handoverPrint,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_tip_handover_station = #{isTipHandoverStation,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
